Tezos protocol.description: Granada, the recently injected protocol upgrade for Tezos, reaches the exploration phase.
Granada, the recently injected protocol upgrade for Tezos, safely brings 2x faster block times, liquidity baking, and the already low gas costs reduced even further by approximately 80%.
Interested in developing on Tezos? SmartPy is a Python library for building and analyzing Tezos smart contracts.

Development.description: A new version of SmaryPy has been released - when needed, entry points become updatable - SmartPy developers can now simply and securely create updatable smart contracts on Tezos.
VR company "Virtualware" joins the Tezos ecosystem in a partnership with Kalamint focusing on bringing NFTs to Virtual Reality.

Music-focused NFT marketplace "OneOf" plans to launch on Tezos and will feature NFTs from Quincy Jones, Whitney Houston, Doja Cat, John Legend, TLC, Charlie Puth, Jacob Collier, G-Eazy, Alesso, and other stars.

Ecosystem.description: The Tezos Foundation has appointed Huge as its agency-of-record without a competitive pitch process.
Equisafe & Pour Que Marseille Vive! association announce the first clean NFT of a physical art piece on Tezos blockchain in France.
Red Bull Racing utilizes the Tezos blockchain to build its first ever NFT fan experience.
